Song.title: O My Soul, Arise
Song.copyright: © 2012 Sovereign Grace Worship Verses by Charles Wesley Music & additional words by Eric McAllister

Arrangement.text:
Intro: [Cm | Cm | Ab | Fm]
VERSE 1: A[Cm]rise, my soul, a[Ab]rise, shake [Bb]off your guilty [Cm]fears The [Cm]bleeding sacri[Eb]fice{,} on [Ab]my be[Bb]half ap[Cm]pears Be[Fm]fore the throne my [Ab]surety stands Be[Bb]fore the throne my [Cm]surety stands [Ab]My name is [Bb]written [G/B]on His [Cm]hands [| Cm | Ab | Fm]
VERSE 2: He [Cm]ever lives a[Ab]bove, for [Bb]me to inter[Cm]cede His [Cm]all redeeming [Eb]love, His [Ab]precious [Bb]blood to [Cm]plead His [Fm]blood atoned for [Ab]every race His [Bb]blood atoned for [Cm]every race And [Ab]sprinkles [Bb]now the [G/B]throne of [Cm]grace
CHORUS: O my [Ab]soul, a[Eb]rise, be[Bb]hold the risen [Cm]Christ [Cm/Bb] Your [Ab]Great High Priest, your [Bb]spotless sacri[Cm]fice [Bb]O my [Ab]soul, a[Eb]rise,{,} God [Bb]owns you as His [Cm]child [Bb] Shake [Ab]off your [Fm]guilty [Bb]fears My [G/B]soul, a[Cm | Cm | Ab | Fm]rise
{new_page} VERSE 3: Five[Cm] bleeding wounds He [Ab]bears, re[Bb]ceived on [Fm]Calva[Cm]ry They [Cm]pour effectual prayers [Eb] They [Ab]strongly [Bb]plead for [Cm]me: "For[Fm]give him, O for[Ab]give," they cry "For[Bb]give him, O for[Cm]give," they cry [Ab]"Don’t let that [Bb]ransomed [G/B]sinner [Cm]die!"
CHORUS: O my [Ab]soul, a[Eb]rise, be[Bb]hold the risen [Cm]Christ [Cm/Bb] Your [Ab]Great High Priest, your [Bb]spotless sacri[Cm]fice [Bb]O my [Ab]soul, a[Eb]rise,{,} God [Bb]owns you as His [Cm]child [Bb] Shake [Ab]off your [Fm]guilty [Bb]fears My [G/B]soul, a[Cm | Cm | Ab | Fm]rise
VERSE 4: My [Cm]God is recon[Ab]ciled, His [Bb]pard’ning [Fm]voice I [Cm]hear He [Cm]owns me as His child[Eb], [ ]I [Ab]can no [Bb]longer [Cm]fear With [Fm]confidence I [Ab]now draw nigh With [Bb]confidence I [Cm]now draw nigh And [Ab]"Father, [Bb]Abba, [G/B]Father," [Cm]cry
Arrangement.searchtext: intro verse 1 arise my soul arise shake off your guilty fears the bleeding sacrifice on my behalf appears before the throne my surety stands before the throne my surety stands my name is written on his hands verse 2 he ever lives above for me to intercede his all redeeming love his precious blood to plead his blood atoned for every race his blood atoned for every race and sprinkles now the throne of grace chorus o my soul arise behold the risen christ your great high priest your spotless sacrifice o my soul arise god owns you as his child shake off your guilty fears my soul arise verse 3 five bleeding wounds he bears received on calvary they pour effectual prayers they strongly plead for me forgive him o forgive they cry forgive him o forgive they cry dont let that ransomed sinner die chorus o my soul arise behold the risen christ your great high priest your spotless sacrifice o my soul arise god owns you as his child shake off your guilty fears my soul arise verse 4 my god is reconciled his pardning voice i hear he owns me as his child i can no longer fear with confidence i now draw nigh with confidence i now draw nigh and father abba father cry
